name: Abdullah Yasin Nur
content: About Me - Abdullah Yasin Nur Skip to content Associate ProfessorDepartment of Computer ScienceOffice: Math 329-AUniversity of New OrleansNew Orleans, LA, 70148Email: ayn@cs.uno.eduPhone: +1 504 280 4389 I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of New Orleans. I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from the University of Louisiana at Lafayette in 2018. My research interests are Network Security, AI-driven Cybersecurity, Network Measurement and Analysis, Network Topology Discovering and Modeling, and Graph Theory. Also, I am very interested in the macroeconomy, the stock market, and the foreign exchange market.
